# Fiola Mare

3050 K St. NW, Ste. 101, Washington, DC, 20007, USA

$$$$ · Seafood, Contemporary

###### Reservations are not available for this restaurant on our site

 [Find bookable restaurants near me](/us/en/restaurants/online-reservation)

# Fiola Mare

3050 K St. NW, Ste. 101, Washington, DC, 20007, USA

$$$$ · Seafood, Contemporary

Hugging the Potomac River with unparalleled views, it may be difficult to find a more beautiful setting in town (those in the know make a move for the terrace). Of course, those lovely sights come at a price, and while the dinner check can climb, lunch offers great value.   
The service team is one well-orchestrated machine, and Executive Chef Matteo Limoli focuses on Italian-influenced seafood of absolute top quality. A plump Capital oyster swims in a zabaglione of prosecco; while liquid cacio e pepe with escarole, feta cheese and roasted peppercorns is an unexpected thrill. Other crowd-pleasers may include Calvisius caviar with warm tigelle modenese and whipped ricotta, or a selection of simply grilled seafood.

Featured in:

* [Best Seafood Restaurants in Washington, DC](/us/en/best-of/best-seafood-restaurants-in-washington-dc)

[Facilities & Services](javascript:void(0);)   [Visit Website](https://www.fiolamaredc.com/)   [+1 202-350-4982](tel:+1 202-350-4982)
